content: wave your trek flag proudly with this star trek the next generation wesley crusher inspired poncho with a turtleneck the signature acting ensign stripes and star trek delta insignia body it s sure to be a hit it is worked from the top down with a mesh pattern and looks great over a tank top or long sleeve t-shirt this pattern uses simple stitches but it recommended for intermediate or advanced crocheters because of the complexity of the insignia and the seamless sizing it includes diagrams and photographs for the visual learners out there it is made with hobbii amigo yarn a lightweight acrylic with lots of stretch and give though written for a s/m size you can size up or down with different hooks the pattern remains the same because of its complexity i m offering it for free to my fellow trekkies all i ask is if you have any issues or comments please let me know so i can improve it llap
